name: Light Fairytale
summary:
Light Fairytale is a 3D turn-based JRPG.

Coming in 2017 on Windows, Mac and Linux. In English and Japanese. 

The game starts with the main character Haru dreaming of vast green plains and a clear blue sky. A scenery he is not supposed to have ever seen, as the world he lives in is deep underground. 

After confronting with the soldiers who rule this dark society
